resources.string: Select
Hello blank fragment
1. Have you ever been told by a doctor that you had a stroke?
2. Have you ever been told by a doctor that you had a mild stroke or almost had a stroke (TIA)?
3. Have you ever had sudden painless weakness on one side of your body?
4. Have you ever had sudden numbness or a dead feeling on one side of your body?
5. Have you ever had sudden painless loss of vision in one or both eyes?
6. Have you ever suddenly lost one half of your vision?
7. Have you ever suddenly lost the ability to understand what people are saying?
8. Have you ever suddenly lost the ability to express yourself verbally or in writing?
1. Within the last 1 year, have you ever had a severe pain across the front of your chest, lasting for half an hour or more?
2. Did the pain occur for the first time in the last year?
3. Have you had an MI, stent, CAD?
1. Do you have any of the following conditions
1. Do you have a family history of Diabetes?
1. During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do vigorous physical activities like heavy lifting, digging, aerobics, or fast bicycling?
2. How much time did you usually spend doing vigorous physical activities on one of those days?
3. During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do moderate physical activities like carrying light loads, bicycling at a regular pace, or doubles tennis? Do not include walking.
4. How many time did you usually spend doing moderate physical activities on one of those days?
5. During the last 7 days, on how many days did you walk?
6. How much time did you usually spend walking on one those days?
1. Do you currently smoke tobacco on daily basis, less than daily, or not at all?
2. In the ‘past’, have you smoked tobacco on daily basis, less than daily, or not at all?
1. Do you currently smoke tobacco on daily basis, less than daily, or not at all?
2. In the past have you used smokeless tobacco on daily basis, less than daily ,or not at all?
1. Do you cook in ghee?
2. Do you add salt at the table while consuming food?
3. How many fruits/ vegetables do you consume in a week?
4. How much bakery products and refined sugar do you consume in a week?
5. How many pizzas, burgers etc. (Western diet) do you consume in a week?
6. How many plates of white rice do you consume per week?
7. How many fish do you consume per week?
